title.rendered: BURBERRY IS HAVING A MAJOR MOMENT!

content.rendered:
BURBERRY IS HAVING A MAJOR MOMENT!

Raise your hand if you always loved Burberry! (I DO, I DO!) We have seen the ‘80s and ‘90s style trend popularity rise with now adding to the designer logo trend, including the famous patters from Fendi and Burberry.

Burberry has a beautiful timeless pattern that I think will be around forever and now it’s more popular than ever. I love adding the Burberry pattern in my accessories by investing in a classic structured Burberry bag and Burberry shoes.

Burberry style is so versatile that it can work every season from Winter to Summer. The new Burberry bags that are coming out have a structured design to them with a modern twist which I love.

Some bags are more casual like the backpacks that are popular now, to new logo patterns with a professional look, to the simple black bags with a large modern logo for a more Alexander Wang cool sporty look and feel to them. I think it’s a great time to invest in a new Burberry bag that can be enjoyed generations to come.

All looks are Burberry from FWRD.COM. Earrings are from FWRD.COM as well. The handbags can be purchased from all major retailers including Saks.com and Nordstrom.com. Let me know your thoughts on this Burberry trend. Are you eyeing a new Burberry purchase?

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only).  Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. New beauty products just added!  

XO XO, DIONNE
